name: Sylvetica
comment:
>>44318675

“Well, it might not work. You never know who you might meet out there, right?” She gives a wicked grin. “And, also, our communications technology reaches further than that of any city we're aware exists by a hilarious factor. Once we're done here, I'll be sending over some maps and important information that might be useful to you. We can discuss what we know more in-detail after we've had the opportunity to research.”

No one in the room—Liza especially—seems to be having a good time.

“If you're really a player, then how the fuck did you set yourself up as a monarch?” You ask.

“It helps when your name is the only one on the Materialization Altar. There's no power struggles. No conflicts of interest.” You look around the room as she speaks, and you can tell the Alliance members are trying not to look at each other. “Everything becomes exactly as reasonable as you are a person. But, luck always plays a role in becoming a Queen. Play your cards right, and you might end up on the throne.”

“Hecatel, listen up.” Liza asks. “Do you know of a guild called Freakshow, or of a man named Anaximander?”

“Hm?” The Queen tilts her head. “...Actually, yes, in fact. Someone by that name was right here in my court not too long ago...”

Archived. Tired as all hell; direct all questions to the Ask page. Thanks for posting, and good night.
